sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import CardDeck from 'react-bootstrap/CardDeck' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import axios from 'axios' function App() { const[latest,setLatest]=useState(""); useEffect(()=>{ axios .get("https://covid19.mathdro.id/api") .then(res=>{ setLatest(res.data); }) .catch(err=>{ console.log(err); }); },[]); return
Cases {latest.confirmed} Last updated 3 mins ago Deaths 0 Last updated 3 mins ago Recovered 99 Last updated 3 mins ago
} export default App;
